items.title: AppLovin: The advertising giant in the making
items.description: The platform uses deep learning technology to explore user data, providing real-time feedback for smart algorithms.

items.title: Could Nvidia's Projected 9% Annual Returns Through 2030 Be the Smartest Risk-Adjusted Play in Tech?
items.description: Nvidia, the dominant platform provider, offers excellent risk-adjusted returns with its expanding ecosystem moat.  While venture capitalists funnel billions into speculative start-ups, Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) continues to dominate the infrastructure powering the entire industry.  A projected 9% annual return may not sound thrilling, but it could be the smartest risk-adjusted investment in tech this decade.

items.title: Apple: Buying More As Fundamentals Deteriorate, Blue Chip Status Remains (Rating Upgrade)
items.description: Apple's valuation dip and stable iOS market share signal potential opportunities. iPhone sales have seemingly stagnated. Read more on AAPL stock here.

items.title: The $1,999 Liberty Phone Is Made in America. Its Creator Explains How.
items.description: Despite the president’s domestic manufacturing push—and the Trump Organization’s launch of an ostensibly U.S.-made phone—the challenges remain massive.

items.title: Is Apple Stock In Trouble?
items.description: The company is struggling to innovate with cutting-edge technologies.
